node.name: my - declare and assign a local variable (lexical scoping)
node.description: A [perlfunc:my|my()] declares the listed variables to be local (lexically) to the enclosing block, file, or [perlfunc:eval|eval()]. If more than one value is listed, the list must be placed in parentheses. See [%linkNodeTitle "perlman:perlsub|Private Variables via my()", $NODE, "Private Variables via my()",{anchor=>"Private_Variables_via_my_"};%] for details.
node.title: perlfunc:my
